acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should be able to manufacture any type of Maps
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldBeAbleToManufactureAnyTypeOfMaps

test-step.description: When I invoke Podam for a Generic Pojo specifying the concrete types
Then the Object should not be null
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type SD4bVDEKgC=1111597939 and value of type csM4ZgJh0D=1831103601
